repair.title: gearbox
repair.description: Repairing various issues related to the gearbox, including gear slipping, difficulty shifting, and abnormal noises.
steps: Diagnosis of gearbox problems
Disassembly and inspection of internal components
Replacement or repair of worn-out gears, bearings, synchronizers, and seals
Cleaning and lubrication of gearbox components
Reassembly with proper alignment and adjustment
Testing to ensure smooth operation

repair.title: engine
repair.description: Addressing engine performance issues such as loss of power, rough idling, or abnormal noises.
steps: Diagnosis of engine problems
Inspection of engine components such as pistons, valves, camshaft, and crankshaft
Repair or replacement of damaged or worn-out engine parts
Overhaul of the engine including cylinder head reconditioning and piston ring replacement
Cleaning and flushing of engine components
Testing and tuning for optimal performance

repair.title: clutch_plate_pressure_plate
repair.description: Repairing clutch assembly issues like slippage, chatter, or difficulty engaging gears.
steps: Assessment of clutch performance issues
Removal of transmission to access clutch assembly
Inspection of clutch plate, pressure plate, release bearing, and clutch fork
Replacement of worn-out or damaged clutch components
Adjustment of clutch pedal free play and hydraulic linkage
Testing for smooth engagement and disengagement

repair.title: body
repair.description: Repairing body damage including dents, scratches, rust, or structural damage.
steps: Evaluation of body damage
Panel replacement or repair using welding, filling, or panel beating
Alignment and adjustment of body panels
Surface preparation, sanding, priming, and painting
Rust treatment and prevention
Installation of new trim, moldings, or decals
